main.name: William A. Lucht
main.description: A highly motivated Full Stack Web Developer with over six years of experience assisting clients in the private sector launch and maintain their websites + infrastructure.
main.bio: A highly motivated Full Stack Web Developer with over six years of experience assisting clients in the private sector launch and maintain their websites + infrastructure. Advanced knowledge of building efficient e-commerce solutions including Bigcommerce, Magento, Salesforce and Woocommerce. Detailed knowledge of managing and planning website builds and assisting clients in maximizing the utility of their online presence. Seeking a position to grow and expand into new and emerging Web/IT technologies.
main.contactmessage: Interested in contacting me? Reach out! I'd love to chat :)

resume.skillmessage: I love Web Technologies! I'm pretty dang good with these technologies:

education.degree: Full Stack Web Development - Certificate of Completion
education.description: This Fullstack Web Development course taught Full Stack Web Development utilizing the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React.js, and Node.js). This course also taught Html, CSS, Javascript, and how to utilize Git/Github in a production environment.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science - Web Design & Development
education.description: This Full Stack course focused on the LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP) development. We also learned core design fundamentals and industry standard design tools utilizing the Adobe Creative Suite.

work.title: Web Project Manager
work.description: Onboarded, prepared, managed, and launched web development projects nationwide. I worked rigorously with my web team to design, build and launch web projects that included small ecommerce stores to large corporate websites for name brands such as Four Peaks Brewing(Anheuser-Busch) and Wine & Design (featured on ABC's Shark Tank)

work.title: Junior Full Stack Engineer
work.description: As the sole Web Developer for a multi-million dollar company, it was my role to maintain the company website and codebase, create new content pages via BigCommerceâ€˜s stencil CLI file structure, assist other departments on backend website errors, build product pages, and assist in our Salesforce implementation. Was company point of contact for all internal IT questions in relation to company website operations.

work.company: Blacart Creative Group - El Cajon, Ca
work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Helped maintain website book of business. Onboarded, designed, built, and launched websites utilizing Wordpress, Magento, Shopify, and Bigcommerce technologies.
